basics.name: Abdulmunim Jundurahman Jemal
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer | NLP | Backend Engineer
basics.summary: Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in NLP, backend development, and speech processing. Passionate about AI research and applying technology to solve real-world challenges, particularly in underrepresented languages.

work.name: Amazethu
work.summary: Developed NLP models for a speech-based language learning app, optimizing speech recognition and translation accuracy for improved user interaction.
highlights: Improved user interaction through optimized NLP systems.

work.name: SMARTi Co.
work.summary: Designed and deployed advanced speech data processing pipelines, improving efficiency in large-scale AI applications of IoT user command recognition and fine-tuning models for real-time performance.
highlights: Deployed efficient pipelines for IoT applications.

work.name: Icog Labs
work.summary: Engaged in Neuro-Symbolic AI research, translating theoretical concepts into executable algorithms, and contributing to Explainable AI methodologies.

work.name: Lesan.AI
work.summary: Built scalable data pipelines, automated preprocessing for multilingual low-resource machine translation, and contributed to end-to-end system improvements in the backend.

projects.name: Afan Oromo News Classification System
projects.summary: Researched and implemented an end-to-end pipeline for low-resource language classification, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy. Published dataset for public use.

projects.name: Amharic Context-Aware Spell Checker
projects.summary: Developed a first-of-its-kind context-aware spell checker for Amharic, addressing limitations of dictionary-based systems.
